Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

  Megaton found the volcano where the transmission had been sent. He dove d=
own into the molten rock inside and forced his way through. The volcano was=
 a good defense against anyone who wasn't an elemental. 

  Like a cork out=
 of a champagne bottle he flew out of the pool nearby the Predacons hideout=
. He didn't know what to expect but he knew that his presence would be welc=
ome once his information about Megatrons forces was known.

  The great dra=
gon looked upon the base with great interest studying the world around him.=
 He opened his toothy mouth and spoke, "Greetings Predacons I have come to =
lead you to victory over the bots you have grown to hate so much."
